member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Margin
member.summary: Paper margin like 2cm, see phantom doc for details http://phantomjs.org/

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Header
member.summary: Html used for page header, you can use special tags to insert page numbers: {#pageNum}/{#numPages}

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.HeaderHeight
member.summary: Height of header like 2cm

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Footer
member.summary: Html used for page footer, you can use special tags to insert page numbers: {#pageNum}/{#numPages}

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.FooterHeight
member.summary: Height of footer like 2cm

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Orientation
member.summary: Paper orientation, possible values "landscape" and "portrait"

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Format
member.summary: Paper format, possible values "A5", "A4", "A3", "Letter", "Tabloid", "Legal" width or height specification takes precedence

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Width
member.summary: Paper width like 2cm

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.Height
member.summary: Paper height like 2cm

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.PrintDelay
member.summary: Milliseconds to wait for js rendering like 1000

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.BlockJavaScript
member.summary: Block all the javascript on the page

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.WaitForJS
member.summary: The printing waits for the trigger, see http://jsreport.net/learn/phantom-pdf

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Phantom.ResourceTimeout
member.summary: Timeout for external resources like scripts or css load

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Template.Shortid
member.summary: Unique 9 alfanum id

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Template.Content
member.summary: Content of report, most often this is html with javasript templating engines

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Template.Helpers
member.summary: Javascript helper functions in format: function a() { }; function b() { };

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Template.Engine
member.summary: Used javascript templating engine like "jsrender" or "handlebars"

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Template.Recipe
member.summary: Used recipe defining rendering process like "html", "phantom-pdf" or "fop"

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Template.Name
member.summary: Readable name, does not need to be unique

member.name: T:jsreport.Types.Report
member.summary: Output of jsreport rendering process

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.Report.Content
member.summary: Stream with report

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.ReportMeta.Logs
member.summary: Logs produced during rendering. Filled only when RenderingRequest.Options.Debug.LogsToResponseHeader=true

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.ReportMeta.ContentType
member.summary: Report content type like application/pdf

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.ReportMeta.FileExtension
member.summary: Report file extension like "html" or "pdf"

member.name: P:jsreport.Types.ReportMeta.ContentDisposition
member.summary: The header which can be used when sending to the browser client
